name: Commanders and Generals
description:
Commanders and Generals is a heavily strategic and tactical game which rewards planning, forethought and coordination.
Your team is composed of 3 Commanders and the General, the General coordinates the team, gives upgrades and reinforces them.
The Commanders or players are given a base and a huge variety of units. Complete with a fully functional and highly realistic logistics system base building and resupply missions are key to success.
AI is supported for playing Commander and as the General.
The map can currently be played on the NA server under the name "Commanders and Generals".
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3XM1cYMOlG4]() \- "Starcraft 2: Commanders and Generals #1"
author: _ForgeUser17403486
